--- title: "Nettoyage et Manipulation des données" output: pdf_document: df_print: kable --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} #install.packages("kableExtra") #install.packages("knitr") library(knitr) library(kableExtra) ``` ::: Une fois les données importées, il est possible d'ajouter certaines modifications à celles-ci : ☀︎ \(I\) Ajout d'uune variable *continent* pour les banques de **Our World in Data** ☀︎ \(II\) Choix de la table 4 du google sheet de **Gapminder** ☀︎ \(III\) autre manipulation ☀︎ \(IV\)autre maniplation ## Nettoyage de la banque data_energy : ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} #install.packages('gapminder') library(gapminder) library(dplyr) data_energy <- read.csv("https://nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/owid-public/data/energy/owid-energy-data.csv") ``` ::: Après avoir téléchargé les données actualisées, il vient de préparer les données pour leur utilisation : ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} gap_tsv <- system.file("extdata", "gapminder.tsv", package = "gapminder") table_continent <- read.delim(gap_tsv) str(table_continent) table_continent <- table_continent[,c( "country", "continent")] data_energie <- left_join(table_continent, data_energy, by = "country") data_carbon <- read.csv("https://nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/owid-public/data/co2/owid-co2-data.csv") data_carbone <- left_join(table_continent, data_carbon, by = "country") data_energie_int <- data_energie[,c( "population", "gdp","electricity_demand","energy_per_gdp")] data_carbone_int <- data_carbone[,c( "population","co2_growth_prct")] ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} print("les données sont prêtes à l'étude") ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` [1] "les données sont prêtes à l'étude" ``` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} kable(summary(data_energie_int)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
population gdp electricity_demand energy_per_gdp
Min. :7.629e+04 Min. :2.105e+08 Min. : 0.00 Min. : 0.08
1st Qu.:3.364e+06 1st Qu.:1.439e+10 1st Qu.: 3.81 1st Qu.: 0.79
Median :8.037e+06 Median :4.570e+10 Median : 17.47 Median : 1.22
Mean :3.453e+07 Mean :3.176e+11 Mean : 141.13 Mean : 1.64
3rd Qu.:2.284e+07 3rd Qu.:1.885e+11 3rd Qu.: 83.87 3rd Qu.: 2.04
Max. :1.426e+09 Max. :1.815e+13 Max. :8466.32 Max. :25.25
NA's :120 NA's :31740 NA's :105300 NA's :73920
````` ::: ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} kable(summary(data_carbone_int)) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
population co2_growth_prct
Min. :4.882e+03 Min. : -100.00

3rd Qu.:1.118e+07 3rd Qu.: 11.00
Max. :1.426e+09 Max. :102318.51
NA's :8484 NA's :122388
````` ::: :::
